snippet: After authorities indicted five hackers with the help of their ringleader-turned-F.B.I.-informant, Hector Xavier Monsegur, other activist hackers faced an existential crisis and uncertain future. Some took down the Web site of the Vatican.
abstract: After authorities indicted five hackers with the help of their ringleader-turned-F.B.I.-informant, Hector Xavier Monsegur, other activist hackers faced an existential crisis and uncertain future. Some took down the Web site of the Vatican.

headline.main: After Hacker Arrests, an Attack on the Vatican and a Growing Anxiety
